effect.short: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use's power is added to this move's power, to a maximum of 200.
